page.title: 12Centenary celebrations cont.
page.content: For another part of the centenary celebrations we had a centenary historic fair.The historic fair used to take place in Dalton a long time ago and it was revived by the parish church about 5 years ago.There were lots of stalls which sold craftwork, handmade articles,homemade sweets, pottery,centenary souvenirs,crisps, etc.Dalton Town Band were playing. There was some clog dancing.Some children from Dalton Church of England School did maypole dancing. Maypole dancing is dancing round a pole which has ribbons attached to it to make patterns.Some people were dressed in old fashioned clothes of 100 years ago.The sun shone on the day and many people turned out out to watch the activities and spend their money on the stalls and raffles.
